formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: For both lateral and withdrawal design values, the adjusted per‑nail value is computed as: R' = R_{ref} \times C_D \times C_M \times C_t \times C_{eg} \times C_{misc} For smooth‑shank withdrawal reference value (educational estimator): W_{ref} = 1380 \cdot G^2 \cdot D \cdot L_p \quad [\text{lb}] Unit conversions: 1 \, \text{kN} = 224.809 \, \text{lb} \quad ; \quad 1 \, \text{lb} = 0.00444822 \, \text{kN} 1 \, \text{in} = 25.4 \, \text{mm} \quad ; \quad 1 \, \text{mm} = 0.0393701 \, \text{in}

changes: Initial audit spec draft generated from HTML extraction (review required).
